title: Southern Wonders Raffle for Hurricane Helene-Ravaged Western North Carolina
content:
If you donated to the Southern Wonders GoFundMe fundraiser for Hurricane Helene victims of Western North Carolina, then you were AUTOMATICALLY entered into a raffle. Every $20 you donated gets you a ticket. Read on for the current list of give-away items, including a Radavist Swag Pack!

THE RAFFLE AS OF 7 AM 10/02:

  • 44 Bikes Custom Steel Marauder SS, 1x Custom 44 Bikes Steel Marauder SS, Your choice of powder coat, 25% off all components for the build
  • FREE ENTRY TO MID SOUTH! The awesome folks at @midsouthgravel are offering a free single entry of your choice to next year’s race.
  • Radavist Swag Pack
  • A one-off set of chrome Cardinal bars and a two-off pair of black Cardinal bars from @wilde.bikes!
  • Two (one green, one beige) @camp.and.go.slow bar tape, voile straps, bar plugs, and Opinel knife kits!
  • A handmade Peregrine Minimalist knife from @nomad.knife.tool!
  • The Ultralunch pack kit from @takeatripco!
  • A completely custom frame bag of your choice from @stringbean_bags!
  • A swag pack with a Steely Dan tee, a Yellowbird Threadworks x Lugs Not Drugs stem cap, and stickers from @lugsnotdrugs!
  • A custom hand-stitched monogram bandana from @laynestitch!
  • A handmade wax canvas tote bag from the old homie @fartherbagco!
  • Swag pack from the everyone’s favorite, Emily from @mountaincat100!
  • Handmade handlebars from @lekerleks!
  • Linocut opossum art print from Cara Smelter.
  • Dale Earnhardt art print from Molly Evelyn Doherty.
  • Handmade leather wallets from Lift Leather Co.
  • A box of vinyl records handpicked by renowned North Carolina-born music writer Grayson Haver-Currin, a former Spring Creek resident. He will curate a selection from his massive personal vinyl collection tailored to your tastes.
  • Friend and bike shop family, David Lane, is also tossing in a brand new pair of silver @velocity CliffHanger 29” rims!
  • And a Southern Wonders care package featuring rare hardcore bootleg clothing I’ve only made for myself—Black Flag Masters Golf dad hat and Fugazi cycling bibs.

 

Many thanks to the brands that have donated. Follow Southern Wonders for updates.
